Reviews.Title: Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Nice Smartphone! Smaller in size than most other Smartphones out there. I hate texting put the keyboard makes it very easy. Picture quality is not great or I just have not figured it all out as yet.

Reviews.Title: This phone is excelent million thumps up
Reviews.Author: Margarita I. Almodovar
Reviews.Content: This phone works super good i dont now why people have to always put a bad review when the phone is excelent. Its super cute, small that fits anywere, it works wonderfully and over all its great and perfect to use and pay cheap for it even prepaid or use it with a contract. It has capability to us it with internet or not. Over all this phone is excelent. I will recomend to any body.

Reviews.Title: i dont know why  i bhought this phone it has no wifi connection or nothing waste
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: horriblethis phone is the worst phone I ever had  I wish I diodnt spend my money on this waste

Reviews.Title: Bought for a friend
Reviews.Author: Jacci.Sunshine
Reviews.Content: I bought for a friend, as far as I know he is still using it.He like it and it was a great deal. if i had to get a prepaid phone this would be it.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Amanda Nowak
Reviews.Content: UM good small smart phone has a few little issues. Sometimes the keyboard wont go full when you turn the phone and the battery life isn't to great

Reviews.Title: great company
Reviews.Author: s.j.s.j.
Reviews.Content: This company was GREAT TO WORK WITH ...they worked with me. I would absoultly us this company again..tk  u  gas.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: octavia
Reviews.Content: This phone was very very very amazing I love it it's pretty small easy it in my pocket I can just take it anywhere without being bulky and I appreciate the seller thanks and I'll shop from you again

Reviews.Title: False description of phone
Reviews.Author: Swasti Reddy
Reviews.Content: Description stated this was a refurbished phone but it was someone's used phone and still had all their info, pics, etc on it. The phone does not even work properly. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: saler need not to be on amazom, he is a bad feedback
Reviews.Author: Silas Nwaeze
Reviews.Content: saler sold  nonworking phone to me, upon contact, he said is good and working,the phone can not even make calls or  ring, battery was braked and where hold with tap, the phone look too order.
